text:
HOITO
SINCE 1918

PANCAKES

The Finlandia $16.50

3 pancakes and 3 pieces of bacon or sausage with hash
The Hoito $12

2 pancakes, 2 pieces of bacon or sausage with hash
The Kallio $8

1 pancake, 1 piece bacon or sausage with hash

Gluten Free pancakes available

Pancake $3.60

GF Pancake $3.60

Bacon $1.50

Sausage $2.00

Hash $2.00

Fruit Sauce $2.00

Egg $1.50

Toast $2.00

LAPSI $5

12 & under
Mini Finlandia

1 Pancake with strawberries, 1 piece bacon or sausage.
Mini Fallers

1 egg, 1 piece of bacon or sausage, toast with hash
Mini Wheeler

2 pieces French toast with choice of fruit sauce, 1 piece of bacon or sausage
BREAKFAST

The Bullbucker $10

3 eggs and 3 pieces of bacon or sausage with hash
The Hooktender $8

2 eggs and 2 pieces of bacon or sausage with hash
The Fallers $6

1 egg, 1 piece of bacon or sausage with hash
LANDINGS

A.T Hill $6

Baked potato, Greek Yogurt Dill Sauce, Bacon
Nor-Wester $10

Sourdough bun, Tomato, Cheese (cheddar or gouda), fried egg peameal bacon, yogurt dill sauce.
Rollway

Mini $5 Snack Size $8
Homemade rice pudding with cinnamon
Raisin Sauce $2.50
WEDNESDAY 3:30 PM - 6:30 PM
SATURDAYS 8 AM - 1 PM
name: Hoito (Inside The Dove Building CLE)
